content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Your personal data is stored by the Company and/or our service providers, strictly to the extent necessary for the performance of our obligations and only for the time necessary to achieve the purposes for which the information is collected, in accordance with applicable law. Subject to the retention periods referred to below, the Company may, as necessary, retain all categories of personal data during your employment and for up to 10 years following the end of your employment (corresponding to the statutory limitations period in Sweden) for its legitimate interest in establishing, exercising and defending legal claims. When the Company no longer needs to use your personal data or does not need to retain it for compliance with any legal or regulatory purpose or for any legitimate purpose of the Company, we will remove it from our systems and/or records and/or take steps to properly anonymize it in such a way that you can no longer be identified.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table\",\"data\":{\"cellSizes\":[356.22216796875,539.8146362304688]},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_row\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{\"colSpan\":null,\"rowSpan\":null},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Processing data\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"11.0pt\",\"mso-bidi-font-size\":\"14.0pt\",\"mso-ascii-font-family\":\"\\\"Times recordings will generally be retained for a time period of three (3) days. In the event of an incident, relevant video recordings will be retained for the period necessary to investigate and/ or report the incident.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"11.0pt\",\"mso-bidi-font-size\":\"14.0pt\",\"mso-ascii-font-family\":\"\\\"Times New Roman\\\"\",\"mso-ascii-theme-font\":\"minor-latin\",\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"PMingLiU\",\"mso-fareast-theme-font\":\"minor-fareast\",\"mso-hansi-font-family\":\"\\\"Times New Roman\\\"\",\"mso-hansi-theme-font\":\"minor-latin\",\"mso-bidi-font-family\":\"\\\"Times New Roman\\\"\",\"mso-bidi-theme-font\":\"minor-bidi\",\"mso-fareast-language\":\"ZH-CN\"}}}]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_row\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{\"colSpan\":null,\"rowSpan\":null},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Conducting background checks and security screenings, to the extent permitted by law\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"11.0pt\",\"mso-bidi-font-size\":\"14.0pt\",\"mso-ascii-font-family\":\"\\\"Times New Roman\\\"\",\"mso-ascii-theme-font\":\"minor-latin\",\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"PMingLiU\",\"mso-fareast-theme-font\":\"minor-fareast\",\"mso-hansi-font-family\":\"\\\"Times New Roman\\\"\",\"mso-hansi-theme-font\":\"minor-latin\",\"mso-bidi-font-family\":\"\\\"Times New Roman\\\"\",\"mso-bidi-theme-font\":\"minor-bidi\",\"mso-fareast-language\":\"ZH-CN\"}}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{\"colSpan\":null,\"rowSpan\":null},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The personal data will be retained for this purpose during the time necessary to conduct the background checks and security screenings. Following the completion, documentation may be kept for the duration of your employment.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_row\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{\"colSpan\":null,\"rowSpan\":null},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For financial or risk management, audit requirements (both internal and external), accounting and cost/budgeting analysis and control\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{\"colSpan\":null,\"rowSpan\":null},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The personal data may be retained for our legitimate interest to manage and evaluate our finances and financial affairs during the life of our company.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The personal data will be retained for the time necessary to comply with our legal obligations or otherwise for financial or risk management, audit requirements, accounting and cost/budgeting analysis and control.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Accounting information will be retained for 7 years after the end of the calendar year during which the financial year ended, to comply with legal obligations under the Bookkeeping Act (1999:1078).\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
